title: Voyage to the End of the Universe

sources.title: Voyage to the End of the Universe (1963)
sources.description: Voyage to the End of the Universe is a science fiction film released in 1963 , originally titled "Voyage to the End of the World" . It is a French film directed by Stéphane Tchalgadjieff and is notable for its stunning visuals and ambitious portrayal of space travel.The film takes viewers on an epic journey through space, exploring themes of existentialism, the universe's vastness, and humanity's place within it. The narrative revolves around a spaceship's voyage towards the edge of the universe, showcasing both the beauty and horrors of space.

metadata.Plot: A giant spaceship carrying colonists to a new planet runs into unexpected troubles on its journey, ranging from encounters with abandoned alien craft to malfunctioning onboard computers and tensions among its crew and passengers.
metadata.Writer: Pavel Jurácek, Stanislaw Lem, Jindrich Polák
metadata.Actors: Zdenek Stepánek, Frantisek Smolík, Dana Medrická
